scripts.check: npm run frontend:check && npm run backend:check
scripts.dev: node scripts/load-env.js && export FRONTEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js frontend) && export BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) && concurrently "npm run backend:dev:watch" "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run mcp:sse"
scripts.backend:dev: BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) npm run backend:dev:watch
scripts.backend:dev:watch: DISABLE_WORKTREE_ORPHAN_CLEANUP=1 BACKEND_PORT=${BACKEND_PORT} cargo -- watch -w backend -x 'run --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml'
